record.title: ELECTING MINORITY MEMBERS TO CERTAIN STANDING COMMITTEES OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES
record.narrative:
ELECTING MINORITY MEMBERS TO CERTAIN STANDING COMMITTEES OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES -- (House of Representatives - February 26, 2008)

[Page: H1046]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, by direction of the House Republic Conference, I send to the desk a privileged resolution and ask for its immediate consideration.

record.narrative: The Clerk read the resolution, as follows:
Resolved, That the following Members are, and are hereby, elected to the following standing committees:
(1) COMMITTEE ON APPROPRIATIONS.--Mr. Bonner of Alabama;
(2) COMMITTEE ON THE BUDGET.--Mr. Jordan of Ohio;
(3) COMMITTEE ON FINANCIAL SERVICES.--Mr. Heller of Nevada;
(4) COMMITTEE ON NATURAL RESOURCES.--Mr. Smith of Nebraska, and Mr. W ittman of Virginia; and,
(5) COMMITTEE ON TRANSPORTATION AND INFRASTRUCTURE.--Mr. Latta.
A motion to reconsider was laid on the table.
